help.title: JJk Support
help.description: If you need support, we're always here to help. It's as easy as joining [JJk support guild](@(1)).

lang.title: Do you want to change the bot's language?
lang.description: Select any language from the list below.
lang.rights: Not enough rights, you must be the owner of the guild.
lang.changed: Done, the bot language has been changed to **@(0)**.

setup.title: Settings
setup.description: Use the buttons to scroll through the list of settings below.
setup.previewDescription: View mode, not enough rights to edit.

fields.name: @(0C) Links `Page: @(0S)/@(0F)`
value:
@(0T) @(0I)Delete Invites@(0I) 
@(0T) @(0I)Delete Scam Links@(0I) 
@(0T) @(0I)Delete Links@(0I) 
@(0T) @(0I)Hide Invites@(0I) 
@(0T) @(0I)Hide Links@(0I)
valueDescription: Removing outside invitations from a user's message, uses a whitelist of links.
Removing popular scam (phishing, etc.) links from a user's message.
Removing any links from a user's message, uses a whitelist of links.
Hiding outside invitations from the user's message, uses a whitelist of links.
Hiding any links from the user's post, uses a whitelist of links.

fields.name: @(0C) WhiteList `Page: @(0S)/@(0F)`
valueDescription: Setting for a whitelist of links, targeting discord links and gifs.

guildCreate.title: Hi!
guildCreate.description: Let me give you a little help.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value: List of commands can be seen by entering a slash `/` in the chat.

errors: There was an error while executing this command!
No rights to use the command!
Command is only available in the guild channels!
Command is only available in private messages [DM] with me!
The command is not available to users!
